title: shrI rAma jayamangaLam
sahitya:
shrI rAma jayamangaLam tiruvuruvAgiya sItApatE mangaLam


anupallavi

  shUra raghukula kumAra sajjana upakArAvatAra gambhIra udhAra guNa


caraNam 1    kAship-padiyil jagadIshan umaikku upadEsham
   sheyyum pugazh koL mAshil tiru nAmanE
  caraNam 2    kAmakOTi sundara shyAma nitya mangaLa
   dhAma unadaDimai rAmadAsan paNiyum
